attributes.review: i think that this app should be deleted bc trump is the worst possible president america has ever had. and the big headed carrot over here is upset bc of the teenagers on tik tok that ruined his little rally. and he thinks he can take away our app that basically saved a lot of lives. nope. we aren’t gonna let that happen so instead of taking tik tok down why do you take this worthless app down. periodt.
